column6: "BRING ME THE HEAD OF MICKEY DOBBS" Everyone's favorite Merc with a Mouth hacks and wisecracks his way across the Marvel Universe in this third ongoing series featuring a new guest-star every month!  This month: the Zapata Brothers, brought to you by the creative team behind DEADPOOL: SUICIDE KINGS, Mike Benson and Carlo Barberi!  What happens when you take the Regenerating Degenerate, a couple of Mexican wrestler bounty hunters, the South American drug cartel, and a one-million dollar bounty on the head of a guy who's already dead? You get a ride into the bowels of a Texas border town, where everyone is out for themselves...and nothing is as it seems. Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Carlo Barberi | penciller:Humberto Ramos | writer:Mike Benson | colorist:Edgar Delgado | inker:Juan Vlasco
